posts.post_title: Looking to buy or trade for a nice Ty Cobb postcard
posts.post_content: looking for some early-year postcards of Ty Cobb. I have a bunch to trade including a sepia Honus Wagner and an SGC (very old label) 6 goudey red ruth, an SGC 2 green t206 Cobb, or also open to purchasing outright. pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if you have one, thanks!
